name: KEEP THE F*CKING GAME ALIVE
description:
Description  What is the game about?

The game is a platformer where you need to remove all the glitches.
These take up your CPU usage, which kills the game.
You also need to make sure you don't run out of energy, thereby shutting down the game!

Controls

WASD to move

*Wall jumping is enabled*

Sidenote

Every asset was made ourselfs except the background song (https://www.toneden.io/exyl/post/ping)

However all the other sounds where created by us!

This game was created by 2 people and
this sure was an adventure. One of us didn't know how to code
so we really did our best on this :P

Hope you enjoy :D
